replies.bodyText:

      in
      4dd43ae
    
    
    
    

        
          
           if (mCurrentDid != 0) { 
        
    
  


I'll extract to a constant
replies.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: ... I didn't, it made more sense to use "use the current value if the intent isn't set".
replies.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: Yeah I saw that, thought it was clever + correct (as was the 404 pick on the test constant ;-)
replies.author: mikehardy

timeline.bodyText: same comment here re: the zero just to connect them - may be nothing but if it is something it's in two spots
timeline.author: mikehardy

timeline.message:
Copy Deck Id when copying note

Note that a note does not have a Deck Id. The deck id is where cards go.

Fixes 6507
